name: Double Breakout Game
overview: Double Breakout Game is a Breakout clone in which one joystick controls one paddle, and the other joystick controls the other. While technically, it can be played with two players, the game was intended by the developer for one player controlling both paddles with both controllers, making it a twin-stick breakout game. The game was developed by Adam Dunkels and published by Booze Design in 1991.
